SELECT MALL.MALL_SEQ_USER_ADDRESS.NEXTVAL FROM dual
INSERT INTO MALL.MALL_TB_USER_ADDRESS ( ADD_ID, USER_ID, CONTACT_NAME, PROVINCE, CITY, AREA, ADDRESS, POSTAL_CODE, TEL, ALIAS, DEFAULTS, STATE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER, BACK_CODE ) VALUES ( #addId:VARCHAR#, #userId:VARCHAR#, #contactName:VARCHAR#, #province:VARCHAR#, #city:VARCHAR#, #area:VARCHAR#, #address:VARCHAR#, #postalCode:VARCHAR#, #tel:VARCHAR#, #contactName:VARCHAR#, 'Y', 'U', sysdate, sysdate, #userId:VARCHAR#, #backCode:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT t.add_id AS addId, t.contact_name AS contactName, t.province, t.city, t.area, t.back_code AS backCode, t.address, t.postal_code AS postalCode, t.tel FROM MALL.MALL_TB_USER_ADDRESS t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.defaults = #defaults# AND t.user_id = #userId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MALL.MALL_TB_USER_ADDRESS t SET t.modify_date = sysdate, t.modify_user = #userId#, t.defaults = 'N' WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.defaults = 'Y' AND t.user_id = #userId#
